example.eg: You believe the sun goes around the Earth, whereas the reverse is true.
example.egtrans: 你相信太阳围着地球转，但事实正好相反。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相反情况, 反面, 背面

example.eg: There was an image of an eagle on the reverse of the coin.
example.egtrans: 硬币背面刻有老鹰的图案。

example.eg: The government reversed its policy on taxing alcohol.
example.egtrans: 政府取消了对酒类产品课税的政策。

dsense.name: reverse [sth]
dsense.guideword: (overturn: a legal decision) (司法，撤销判决)

example.eg: The judge reversed the defendant's conviction.
example.egtrans: 法官推翻了对被告的有罪判决。

example.eg: Seeing that he had put his jumper on back to front, James reversed it.
example.egtrans: 看到自己把套头衫前后穿反，詹姆士赶紧将其翻转过来穿好。

example.eg: As Daisy earned more than Ben, they decided to reverse the traditional roles; Daisy went out to work and Ben took care of the children.
example.egtrans: 因为黛西比本挣的钱多，所以他们决定交换传统角色：黛西出去工作，本留在家里看孩子。

example.eg: Alison reversed the car into the garage.
example.egtrans: 艾莉森把车倒进车库里。

example.eg: Harry turned the coin over and saw that the reverse side was shinier.
example.egtrans: 哈利把硬币翻过来，看到背面更光亮些。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相反的，反向的, 背面的，反面的

example.eg: Mary put the car into reverse and pulled out of the parking space.
The firm suffered an unexpected reverse when the CEO quit suddenly.
example.egtrans: 首席执行官突然离职，该公司遭到了意想不到的挫折。

example.eg: Carl reversed along the narrow lane until he reached a passing place.
Melanie reversed the jacket, so that the red side was outwards.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使颠倒, 使反向, 使翻过来

example.eg: The librarian reversed the order of the books on the shelf, so that authors whose names appeared later in the alphabet came first.
She listed the names in reverse, not alphabetically.
I put the car in reverse and backed into the garage.
The vehicle was in reverse when the crash happened.
Many people believe that minority quotas are reverse discrimination.
